channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Logan Paul backflips on defamation lawsuit against Coffeezilla, apologizes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen Katte
item.description: Logan Paul has deleted his response video aimed at Coffeezilla and has apologized in a surprise u-turn.

item.title: Why DeFi should expect more hacks this year: Blockchain security execs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: One reason is that “hackers have gotten smarter, gained more experience, and learned how to look for bugs,” according to the founder of a crypto auditing firm.

item.title: Mexico’s digital peso delayed, launch date unclear
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Mexico’s central bank is working on legal, administrative and technological requirements for the peso’s digital version.

item.title: Digital Currency Group under investigation by US authorities: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: U.S. authorities are reportedly investigating internal transfers from Digital Currency Group to its subsidiary Genesis.

item.title: Bitcoin, Sango Coin and the Central African Republic
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joseph Hall
item.description: The Central African Republic adopted Bitcoin and swiftly created its own token, Sango Coin. But where did Sango Coin come from, and why is it necessary?

item.title: Wyre imposes up to a 90% withdrawal limit for all users
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: Wyre has imposed a daily withdrawal limit on its platform, citing “the best interest of our community.”

item.title: Ferrari cuts ties with crypto sponsor ahead of 2023 Formula One season
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: The Ferrari-Velas partnership from 2021 — set at $30 million a year — was aimed at increasing fan engagement through nonfungible tokens (NFTs) and other shared initiatives.

item.title: FTX asset sales challenged by U.S. Trustee: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: A U.S. Trustee filed an objection to plans by FTX to sell its units in Europe and Japan, among other businesses.

item.title: SBF pleads not guilty, crypto layoffs, and bank run on Silvergate: Hodler’s Digest, Jan. 1-7
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Editorial Staff

item.title: Hedge funds subpoenaed by US prosecutors as Binance probe unfolds: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: United States prosecutors are examining hedge funds’ relationships with cryptocurrency exchange Binance as part of a money laundering investigation.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried's charitable donations sought by FTX: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: FTX's new management is seeking to recover millions of dollars donated by Future Fund and SBF.

item.title: Using blockchain technology to combat retail theft
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rachel Wolfson
item.description: Blockchain technology may be a solution when it comes to anti-theft measures for retailers.

item.title: OpenAI will lead to better art and narration in Web3 games — Immutable exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Alex Connelly says the technology provides “very cool storytelling opportunities.”

item.title: Bitcoin price nears 3-week high as trader says sub-7% CPI may see $19K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bets are increasing on a push higher for Bitcoin and on BTC price action defining the current range as its macro bottom.

item.title: Metaverse to possibly create $5T in value by 2030: McKinsey report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: The success of Metaverse will rely on a greater focus on maximizing the human experience aimed at delivering positive experiences for consumers, end-users, and citizens.

item.title: Bluechip NFT project Moonbirds signs with Hollywood talent agents UTA
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: PROOF Co-founder Kevin Rose announced the deal via Twitter on Jan. 6, noting that the aim is to get the Moonbirds brand recognized on a global scale and not just in the Web3 space.

item.title: SuperRare cuts 30% of staff as growth slows during crypto winter
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Despite only being a week into the new year, SuperRare adds to a number of firms announcing staff cuts such as Huobi and Genesis.

item.title: Mastercard partners with Polygon to launch Web3 musician accelerator program
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The program will help five emerging artists set up and manage their brands in the Web3 space, and is also aimed at educating people in the music scene on what avenues Web3 tech can offer them.

item.title: NFT project accepted $3M to move its collection to Polygon
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The team had previously announced the move, but had not revealed the cash deal.

item.title: $3.9 billion lost in the cryptocurrency market in 2022: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The report from Immunefi revealed hacks to have been the main cause of related losses.

item.title: FTX collapse may boost 'further trust' in crypto ecosystem — Nomura exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Jez Mohideen, co-founder and CEO at Laser Digital, argued that traditional financial companies entering the crypto space will help to regulate the industry.

item.title: Silvergate gets more bad news as Moody’s slashes its ratings
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The beleaguered bank was allegedly moving money between FTX and Alameda; then it sold debt at a discount and sacked employees after a bank run.

item.title: FTX, Bahamian FTX DM reach agreement on info sharing, disposition of property, assets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The sides had been at odds over numerous issues and have agreed to keep working on the remaining open questions they face.

item.title: Macroeconomic data points toward intensifying pain for crypto investors in 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: Chances of a crypto bull market in 2023 decrease as the Fed maintains a hawkish stance and threats of a recession in the U.S. economy continue to appear.

item.title: El Salvador’s Bitcoin strategy evolved with the bear market in 2022
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Inigo Vaca
item.description: After making Bitcoin legal tender in the country, El Salvador has faced a tough year of critics and the nonstop sinking of Bitcoin pricing.

item.title: December DeFi exploits were the lowest in 2022: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The DeFi market didn't see much change in its first week of new year compared to the last week of 2022 as the price momentum remained in a similar zone.

item.title: Price analysis 1/6: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, DOGE, ADA, MATIC, DOT, LTC, UNI
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: A rally in equities markets is providing support to BTC and altcoins, but bulls will likely struggle in keeping the momentum needed to turn overhead resistance levels to support.

item.title: US authorities launch page to notify FTX’s alleged victims about SBF’s case
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to the court filing, the number of victims in the FTX case made it “impractical” to rely on more traditional methods of notification.

item.title: Huobi net outflows crossed over 60M within the past 24 hours: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: According to a report by Nansen, approximately $94.2 million has flowed out of the exchange within the past week.

item.title: Crypto Biz: SBF has his day in court; Barry Silbert accused of ‘stalling’ over frozen funds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sam Bourgi
item.description: The founder of FTX pleaded not guilty to all criminal charges related to the collapse of crypto exchange FTX.
